name: Vasco da Lucena Giving his Work to Charles the Bold

description: Vasco da Lucena Giving his Work to Charles the Bold; Master of the Jardin de vertueuse consolation and assistant (Flemish, active 3rd quarter of 15th century); Bruges (illuminated), Belgium; about 1470 - 1475; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Ms. Ludwig XV 8, fol. 2v; J.
